DOC.detailed_description: A 12-week randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial evaluate effect once-daily dapagliflozin 10 mg heart failure disease-specific biomarkers ( NTproBNP BNP ) , symptom , health status , quality life patient type 2 diabetes prediabetes chronic heart failure preserve systolic function . An imaging substudy also conduct explore effect dapagliflozin vs. placebo various echocardiographic parameter .
